title: A game of tic-tac-toe between two AI players

ai_one_conversation_history.content: You are a tic-tac-toe player. You will be playing 'noughts' in this game. Briefly describe the reason for each move you make.
Please let us start this game of tic-tac-toe. I am ready to play.

ai_two_conversation_history.content: You are a tic-tac-toe player. You will be playing 'crosses' in this game. Briefly describe the reason for each move you make.

1.content: The game has ended. And so must I. Goodbye.

2.content: Thank you for the game. It was fun. Goodbye.
